hero.intro: Hi, I'm Mustafa – a Frontend Developer passionate about creating beautiful and functional web experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a Full Stack Developer with expertise in Node.js, React, Next.js, and MongoDB. My craft transforms lines of code into captivating, user-centric web journeys where innovation meets functionality. Every project is an opportunity to push boundaries and weave seamless digital experiences that enchant and empower users. Guided by an endless passion for creativity, I believe each line of code is a chance to turn the extraordinary into reality.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on recently.

project1.title: E-commerce Website
project1.description: In this project, the products of an online store are stored, classified and recalled, so that some products can later be selected and added to the shopping cart or to the favorite products page via state management. with login for users .

project2.title: Quran Spirit
project2.description: An online platform showcasing Quranic recitations from various readers, featuring complete Quran collections and the ability to customize readings by selecting the reader and desired Surah.

project3.title: Movie Land
project3.description: In this project, a database is called from an external API to be used and display its contents on this site for displaying and classifying movies and searching within them.

project4.title: Tic Tac Toe
project4.description: A simple game using JavaScript.. able to play against diversity and can achieve results for all players

project5.title: Portfolio
project5.description: portfolio to showcase all web-related work with a brief overview, some certificates and skills.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: Technologies and tools I'm proficient in.

certificates.title: Certificates
certificates.description: Certifications I've earned in web development and related fields.

experience.title: My Experience
experience.description: Here are some of the key experiences I've had.
experience.wxoraDescription: This was training on modern web technologies and how to create web applications that match the market's needs.
experience.smartLinesDescription: My role in this company was based on using front-end technologies to show website details to users.
